ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pf1const.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | pf1const.q | |- Q = ran ( eval1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( eval1 ` R ) = ( eval1 ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( var1 ` R ) = ( var1 ` R ) |
| 5 | 3, 4, 1 | #P_evl1var | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( ( eval1 ` R ) ` ( var1 ` R ) ) = ( _I |` B ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Poly1 ` R ) = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R ^s B ) = ( R ^s B ) |
| 8 | 3, 6, 7, 1 | #P_evl1rhm | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( eval1 ` R ) e. ( ( Poly1 ` R ) RingHom ( R ^s B ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) = ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) = ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_rhmf | |- ( ( eval1 ` R ) e. ( ( Poly1 ` R ) RingHom ( R ^s B ) ) -> ( eval1 ` R ) : ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) --> ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( eval1 ` R ) : ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) --> ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) -> ( eval1 ` R ) Fn ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 11, 12 | #P_3syl | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( eval1 ` R ) Fn ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 15 | 4, 6, 9 | #P_vr1cl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( var1 ` R ) e. ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( var1 ` R ) e. ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_fnfvelrn | |- ( ( ( eval1 ` R ) Fn ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) /\ ( var1 ` R ) e. ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) -> ( ( eval1 ` R ) ` ( var1 ` R ) ) e. ran ( eval1 ` R ) ) |
| 18 | 13, 16, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( ( eval1 ` R ) ` ( var1 ` R ) ) e. ran ( eval1 ` R ) ) |
| 19 | 5, 18 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( _I |` B ) e. ran ( eval1 ` R ) ) |
| 20 | 19, 2 | #P_syl6eleqr | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( _I |` B ) e. Q ) |
